title: Hunt the Wumpus
author: Inspired by Gregory Yob's 1973 Classic
intro:
You are hunting the deadly Wumpus!

The Wumpus lives in a cave of 20 rooms connected by tunnels. The cave
has hazards: bottomless pits that will kill you, and giant bats that
will carry you to random rooms.

You have 5 crooked arrows. You can shoot an arrow through up to 5 rooms.
If your arrow hits the Wumpus, you win! If you enter the Wumpus's room,
it eats you. If you shoot yourself, you die (embarrassing).

You can sense nearby hazards:
- Wumpus nearby: 'I smell a Wumpus!'
- Pit nearby: 'I feel a draft!'
- Bats nearby: 'I hear bats!'

Good luck, hunter!

rooms.name: Cave Room 1
rooms.description: You are in room 1 of the cave system. Tunnels lead to rooms 2, 5, and 8.

rooms.name: Cave Room 2
rooms.description: You are in room 2. Tunnels lead to 1, 3, and 10.

rooms.name: Cave Room 3
rooms.description: You are in room 3. Tunnels lead to 2, 4, and 12.

rooms.name: Cave Room 4
rooms.description: You are in room 4. Tunnels lead to 3, 5, and 14.

rooms.name: Cave Room 5
rooms.description: You are in room 5. Tunnels lead to 1, 4, and 6.

rooms.name: Cave Room 6
rooms.description: You are in room 6. Tunnels lead to 5, 7, and 15.

rooms.name: Cave Room 7
rooms.description: You are in room 7. Tunnels lead to 6, 8, and 17.

rooms.name: Cave Room 8
rooms.description: You are in room 8. Tunnels lead to 1, 7, and 11.

rooms.name: Cave Room 9 - BAT ROOM
rooms.description: Giant bats live here! They grab you and drop you somewhere random!

rooms.name: Cave Room 10
rooms.description: You are in room 10. Tunnels lead to 2, 9, and 11.

rooms.name: Cave Room 11
rooms.description: You are in room 11. Tunnels lead to 8, 10, and 20.

rooms.name: Cave Room 12 - PIT
rooms.description: AAAAAH! A bottomless pit! You fall to your death!

rooms.name: Cave Room 13
rooms.description: You are in room 13. Tunnels lead to 4, 14, and 16.

rooms.name: Cave Room 14
rooms.description: You are in room 14. Tunnels lead to 4, 13, and 15.

rooms.name: Cave Room 15 - BAT ROOM
rooms.description: More giant bats! They carry you away!

rooms.name: Cave Room 16
rooms.description: You are in room 16. Tunnels lead to 13, 15, and 17.

rooms.name: Cave Room 17 - PIT
rooms.description: AAAAAH! Another pit! You fall!

rooms.name: Cave Room 18
rooms.description: You are in room 18. Tunnels lead to 16, 17, and 19.

rooms.name: Cave Room 19
rooms.description: You are in room 19. Tunnels lead to 9, 18, and 20.

rooms.name: Cave Room 20 - WUMPUS LAIR
rooms.description: You hear a terrible roar! The WUMPUS is here!

items.name: crooked arrow
items.description: A special arrow that can curve through tunnels.

monsters.name: Wumpus
monsters.description: A terrible beast with sucker-filled tentacles! If you enter its room, it eats you. Shoot it with an arrow to win!

quests.name: Hunt the Wumpus
quests.description: Shoot the Wumpus with your crooked arrows before it eats you!

notes: One of the earliest computer games
Player must deduce Wumpus location from clues
